text: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can.
author: Horatio Nelson

text: The best way to navigate through life is to give up all of our controls.
author: Gerald Jampolsky

text: When you do not know what you are doing and what you are doing is the best - that is inspiration.
author: Robert Bresson

text: The creed of a true saint is to make the best of life, and to make the most of it.
author: Edwin Hubbel Chapin
